reviewText: Another fun packed DVD, starring Kipper, Tiger, Pig and Arnold.Lots of snow fun, and entertaining even when it's not Christmas.The quality of the DVD is a lot better, with a menu that allows you to play all episodes, or choose your favorite.  You can also choose to skip the previews, which is a big plus for repeat viewing.The high point is hearing Arnold "speak", when he gets his very own igloo.We love Kipper, and will continue to recommend the series, once the DVD's continue to be such great value for the price.
Title: N/A

reviewText: All the Kipper videos are great.  Perfect for kids from 2-102.  Kipper is alway so gently and kind.  Never so much excitement that gets your kids hyper and never objectionable like so many other cartoons.

reviewText: We always enjoy a funny story about snow. This one does not disappoint. Kipper is a sweet, funny, and helpful dog who has sweet little adventures. Snow especially appeals to us as we live in the South and seldom see it.

reviewText: My 7 yr old granddaughter liked everything about it!! Anything Kipper is of value in our home due to its fun and honest humor!
Title: N/A

reviewText: kipper does lots of things that apply to the everyday life of toddlers and preschool aged kids. my son is 3.5 and he loves this dvd. the dvd contain several small episodes and the character are polite and helpful and will help your child learn proper manners. characters in kipper videos have an english or brittish accent, yet are easy to understand.
summary: kipper is a preschool favorite, simple and funny

reviewText: My almost 3-year-old granddaughter loves this movie - she watches it often at my house.  She loves the animal-oriented animated movies, especially Kipper!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Great show about a dog and his friends. Just good clean fun you can let your kids watch with no worries about language or progressive themes like humans are bad and we are killing the world. It is safe to let them watch it alone. My son just turned seven and my daughter is four. They both have watched it all their lives and still watch it. My seven year old is moving on to more grown up cartoons now, but the four year old watches at least a few episodes a week. For the kids to watch the show for a few years and still like it. There must be something good about the show. Hope this helps.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My toddler just loves Let It Snow.  He has only been in snow once but he watches this episode over and over again.  Kipper having snowball fights with Tiger, getting a christmas tree, and making an igloo... lots of fun.
